description: This series uses live action, animation and song to promote an awareness and understanding of how the body works and what it needs to stay healthy. In ten episodes, Zardip, a friendly alien, learns about the human body, diet and nutrition, growth, the value of exercise and sleep, germs and how to take care of the teeth.
